name: Lucy Ives
bio: Lucy Ives is most recently the author of the novel Loudermilk: Or, The Real Poet; Or, The Origin of the World (2019) and the hybrid photobook The Poetics (2019, with photographs by Matthew Connors), and a collection of short stories, Cosmogony (Soft Skull Press, 2021). She is also editor of The Saddest Thing Is That I Have Had to Use Words: A Madeline Gins Reader (2020). She writes regularly on contemporary art and literature for Art in America and frieze, among other publications.
